hero.title: Nishit Sanil
hero.subtitle: The Oliemannetje of Ideas & Exploration
hero.description: I’m a modern-day “little oil man”: a connector, organizer, and creative generalist greasing the wheels of innovation and culture. From Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu mats to the far reaches of deep-space photography, I bring diverse passions together to spark new insights—and share them with you.
hero.backgroundAlt: Abstract minimal gradient evoking night sky transitioning to dawn light

sections.title: Design & Art
sections.summary: I craft visual stories—whether through bold motion graphics or subtle phenomenological sketches—drawing from Indian artistic traditions and contemporary minimalism.
highlights: Motion cues aligned with attention, not distraction
Phenomenological sketches to clarify felt intent

image.alt: Minimal linework inspired by Indian motifs

sections.title: Research & Math/Physics
sections.summary: My curiosity spans from abstract algebra to celestial mechanics. I build models, analyze patterns, and ask “What’s beyond the horizon?”—whether in equations or through my telescope lens.
highlights: From intuition to equations to observation
Bias and error checks as first-class steps

image.alt: Graph curves with annotated turning points

sections.title: Operations & EA
sections.summary: I’ve led event productions, coordinated cross-disciplinary teams, and helped Effective Altruism communities flourish—always with an eye toward impact, transparency, and long-term flourishing.
highlights: Clear SOPs, cadences, and transparent metrics

sections.title: Meditation & Phenomenology
sections.summary: Rooted in mindfulness practice, I explore how we experience the world. That depth of attention informs every project, making each interaction more humane and meaningful.
highlights: Design microcopy that reduces cognitive load

image.alt: Calm gradient evoking breath and presence

sections.title: Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu
sections.summary: On the mats, I learn resilience, flow, and creative problem-solving—principles that translate directly into design sprints, research pivots, and team dynamics.

sections.title: Astrophotography
sections.summary: Capturing nebulae and galaxies reminds me that even the vastest systems hinge on delicate interconnections—much like the networks I help build on Earth.
highlights: Story arcs from raw photons to meaning

cta.headline: Let’s Connect
cta.body: I believe in stories that unfold through conversation and exploration. Feel free to scroll, click, or even “chat” your way through this page to discover more.
